column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Why do you guys live on the river ? "
#Text=Dock says : " Because we 're a fishing town .
#Text=" Katara says : " Look at this place .
#Text=It 's so sad .
#Text=We have to do something to help .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , we ca n't waste our time here .
#Text=We have a bigger mission that we need to stay focused on .
#Text=These people are on their own .
#Text=" Katara says : " These people are starving !
#Text=But you 'd turn your back on them ?
#Text=How can you be so cold and heartless ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not turning my back , I 'm just being realistic .
#Text=We ca n't go around helping every rinky - dink town we wander into .
#Text=We 'll be helping them all by taking out the Fire Lord .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , loud mouths !
#Text=Maybe we should be a little quieter when we talk about " taking out the Fire Lord . "
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on , Katara , be reasonable about this .
#Text=You know our mission has to come first .
#Text=" Katara says : " I guess so .
#Text=" Aang says : " Let 's just get what we need and go .
#Text="
